text: The Crossroads is one of the largest communities of the [[Towering Wood]]. It is also known as "Stumptown", because it is built inside the massive stump of a fallen ormatree, the breathtaking thousand-foot-high trees of the Wood. The Crossroads lies along the migratory paths of a number of different nomadic tribes of the [[Eldeen Reaches]], and serves as a central marketplace where people from different communities and sects exchange goods and services.
title: Crossroads
